data.title: Horam Park Golf Club
data.meta_description: Highly regarded venue located a few hundred metres from the Wealden crematorium offering excellent funeral teas and buffets.
data.text:
Conveniently located half a mile from the Wealden crematorium, Horam Park Golf Club provides an ideal setting to say goodbye to and celebrate the life of your loved one.

We understand how difficult it can be to plan a funeral reception, wake or celebration of life. We have many years’ experience in hosting these occasions and can ensure a simple arrangement process for you at this emotional time.

We can cater for up to 100 people, with room layouts to suit either smaller or larger numbers. There is ample parking and disabled access.

Our compassionate team will work with you to ensure your funeral reception or wake meets your preferences and expectations.

Catering

Our catering team can provide the food for your funeral reception or wake. We can be very flexible in our availability and will arrange a menu to suit your tastes, from finger buffets to sit down meals. Please note we do not allow self-catering at this venue.

Please don’t hesitate to contact us on 01435 813477 (advised) or click the Rates button above to send us a message.

Wealden Crematorium

Wealden Crematorium is a beautiful, state-of-the-art crematorium set in 25 acres of rural Sussex countryside on the A267 just south of the village of Horam.

Opened in 2019, the architecture is unapologetically modern yet sensitive to the countryside around it. Importantly it also means that Wealden residents no longer need to leave the district for cremation.

Surrounded by glorious wildflower meadows, woodland and pasture with sheep grazing, the crematorium offers a peaceful and sensitive setting to say goodbye to loved ones.

The chapel seats over 120 mourners and there is a Flower Court and a landscaped garden of remembrance.
